data: {"generalSituation":"A replenishment of the northeast monsoon will reach the coast of southern China tonight to tomorrow morning. The weather will be cloudier over the region with temperatures falling progressively during Christmas holidays. It will be rather cool in the morning and cold over inland areas. The dry monsoon will bring generally fine weather to Guangdong during the weekend to early next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas. A band of clouds is expected to cover the coast of southern China midweek next week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251225","week":"Thursday","forecastWind":"North force 4 to 5, occasionally force 6 offshore and on high ground.","forecastWeather":"Becoming cool. Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches in the morning and at night.
